name: Chest Simulator
description:
Open a randomly generated chest with loot inside of it. The loot is randomly generated and there are 5 rarities. Common: 75%, Rare: 50%, Epic: 25%, Legendary: 10%, and GAMER: 1%!!11!!!1!

See how lucky you can get !

Notes:
Click M to mute/unmute all sounds.
The source code is in the assets/lootchests.py.
If you want to add more items you can edit the table.json file.
Removing any files will cause in a crash!

Update 2.0:
Changed icon sizes to be bigger.
Made an opening and closing sound, not just both played at the same time.
